emailNotRecognised.pageTitle: We do not recognise your email address
emailNotRecognised.heading: We do not recognise your email address
emailNotRecognised.bodyOne: The email address you've signed in with was not included in a registration or accreditation form.
emailNotRecognised.bodyTwo: The business must be set up to use this service by someone who was named on one of these forms.
emailNotRecognised.listItemOne: check that you've signed in to the correct Defra account
emailNotRecognised.listItemTwo: ask someone who was named on the forms to complete this step before you try to access the service again
emailNotRecognised.listItemThreeAfterLink: if you need to check that the business's registration or accreditation has been approved

linking.heading: Link {{ serviceName }} to its registration
linking.bodyOne: As you're the first person from your organisation to access this service, you need to link the organisation to a registration we've previously received.
linking.bodyTwo: You'll only need to confirm this once, on behalf of the organisation you represent.
linking.subheading: Select the registration to link to {{ serviceName }}
